parameterdescription.para: token created in token module in https://app.vinou.de
authid from invoice config in settings area in https://app.vinou.de

detaileddescription.para: Load settings from settings.yml in config directory given by constant VINOU_CONFIG_DIR
Checks the vinou tokens set in session and creates new token if old one is expired

simplesect.para: boolean returns false if login is expired and token cant be regenerated

detaileddescription.para: Creates token with auth credentials and store it to session

parameterdescription.para: enable token storing into session data

detaileddescription.para: Create API request with postdata using Guzzle http agent

parameterdescription.para: api route to call without leading slash all routes prefixed with service
enable additional header if client authentification is needed

simplesect.para: array|false $response response body if route status code was 200
